categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Serjay Thul was a Human male who was the apprentice of the Sith Darth Viktus and the first member of House of Thul to survive the Sith academy on the planet Korriban during the Cold War. He after advice of Moff Sarek charged an unidentified Sith Imperial to ally with Chanya Medaal of Order of Extermination. to eliminate the threat of Killik Black Hive.
